name: Demon's Musical
description:
The player explores his world by gathering companions who wish to help him on his adventure as he defeats monsters with the power of music, enhancing his melody with sound effects, and enhancing his instrument.

Francesco Langostini is a musician who loves his instrument, it is his greatest treasure. One day, the demon king stole his most valuable possession. Since then, he decided to embark on his adventure to recover his treasure while gathering companions who will increase his musical power.
